entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is described as a very pretty girl who played Seeker on the Ravenclaw team. She waved and smiled at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as waving back to Cho Chang, but also slopped water down his front.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as smirking and being pointed out by Harry.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a school that the teenagers do not attend.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as having a penfriend at a school in Brazil.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Mum is mentioned as not allowing Bill to go on an exchange trip.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Dad is mentioned as not allowing Bill to go on an exchange trip.

relationships.description: Harry waved back at Cho Chang.
Ron was smirking and Harry pointed him out.
